author: John Cross
title: Barcelona are ready to make a move for Saints defender Cedric Soares
text:
Sport Barcelona are ready to make a move for Saints defender Cedric Soares The Spanish giants have been impressed with the performances by the Southampton right back and look set to make a £25m offer Share Soares could be playing his football at the Nou Camp next season (Photo: Action Images via Reuters) Share Get FC Barcelona   
Barcelona are targeting Southampton right back Cedric Soares . 
The Spanish giants are tracking the £25m-rated Portugal full back who has been hugely impressive this season. 
Soares, 25, cost Southampton just £5m in 2015 and has gone from strength to strength in the Premier League as well as winning Euro 2016. 
That has convinced Barcelona that he is ready to step up to the next level and they believe the attacking full back could be an answer to their defensive problems. Soares continues to impress in the Saints defence and is attracting interest from the top European clubs (Photo: PA) Read More Southampton star Virgil van Dijk will NOT be moving to Liverpool or Manchester City 
Barcelona have struggled to replace Dani Alves and right back is an area they are looking to strengthen this summer. 
Southampton are aware of interest from big clubs and face a battle to keep him but may be tempted to sell if they can get the right price. 
Soares is understood to be keen on the potential switch with Barcelona already laying the ground work for a summer move. Virgil van Dijk has also been linked with a big money move away from the Saints (Photo: Stephen Pond/Getty Images)
